title: Review of in-vitro studies evaluating respiratory toxicity of aerosols: impact of cell types, chemical composition, and atmospheric processing
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00475B, Critical Review
Sudheer Salana, Vishal Verma
In recent decades, several cell-based and acellular methods have been developed to evaluate ambient particulate matter (PM) toxicity. Although cell-based methods provide a more comprehensive assessment of PM toxicity, their...
